tour_name: Treasures of the Tropics: Sri Lanka and the Maldives

locations.name: Sigiriya
locations.description: Likely base for exploring ancient cities and climbing Sigiriya Rock Fortress, located in Sri Lanka's Cultural Triangle.

locations.name: Nuwara Eliya
locations.description: Located in Sri Lanka's cool highlands, known for its tea plantations and colonial charm.

locations.name: Yala National Park
locations.description: Area for wildlife safaris in Sri Lanka. Accommodation is typically in lodges near or just outside the park boundaries (e.g., near Tissamaharama).

locations.name: The Maldives
locations.description: An archipelagic country known for its luxurious island resorts, white sand beaches, and clear waters. The specific island/atoll isn't mentioned, so coordinates represent the general country region.
